import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { createBookAction } from '../../redux/actions/books/bookActions'; const AddBook = () => { const [category, setCategory] = useState(''); const [title, setTitle] = useState(''); const [author, setAuthor] = useState(''); //dispatch const dispatch = useDispatch(); //Handle form submit const handleFormSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault(); const data = { title, author, category, }; dispatch(createBookAction(data)); }; return (
Create Book

setAuthor(e.target.value)} type='text' className='form-control' id='exampleInputEmail1' aria-describedby='emailHelp' placeholder='Author name' />
setTitle(e.target.value)} type='text' className='form-control' id='exampleInputPassword1' placeholder='Book title' />
); }; export default AddBook;
